mapper.select: select * from manage_function ORDER BY editTime DESC
select functionId,functionName,menuId from manage_function where menuId = #{id}
select m.menuId,m.name,f.functionName,f.functionId,f.functionCode from manage_function f,business_menu m where f.menuId=m.menuId and f.functionId = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM manage_function where functionName like '%${link}%'
mapper.insert: insert into manage_function( menuId, functionName, functionDesc, functionCode, createTime, editTime, editor ) values( '${menuId}', '${functionName}', '${functionDesc}', '${functionCode}', '${createTime}', '${editTime}', '${editor}' )
mapper.update: update manage_function set menuId='${menuId}', functionName='${functionName}', functionDesc='${functionDesc}', functionCode='${functionCode}', editTime='${editTime}', editor='${editor}' where functionId='${functionId}'
